targets.query: SELECT mean(temp) as temp FROM "temp" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT count("http_response_code") FROM "http_response" WHERE (http_response_code > 400) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server", "status_code" fill(0)
SELECT mean(temp) as temp FROM "temp" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
